headline: Kroger plans to name former Walmart exec Greg Foran as new CEO, report
summary: Cincinnati-based supermarket giant Kroger will name former Walmart executive Greg Foran, 64, as its next CEO, according to a report by the Wall Street Journal.

content.title: Kroger plans to name former Walmart exec Greg Foran as new CEO, report
content.summary: Cincinnati-based supermarket giant Kroger will name former Walmart executive Greg Foran, 64, as its next CEO, according to a report by the Wall Street Journal.

thumbnail.caption: The Kroger building features new branding in downtown Cincinnati on Tuesday, April 22, 2025.

headline: Walmart Customers Rally To Support Military Families
summary: Operation Homefront, a leading national military nonprofit, announced today that Walmart's Spark Good program raised more than $2.9 million, including a 2:1 match from Walmart—thanks to the incredible generosity of Walmart.com and Walmart app customers. This marks the third consecutive year Walmart has selected Operation Homefront as a beneficiary of the Spark Good Veterans Day Round Up, underscoring their unwavering commitment to military and veteran families nationwide.

content.title: Walmart Customers Rally To Support Military Families
content.summary: Operation Homefront, a leading national military nonprofit, announced today that Walmart's Spark Good program raised more than $2.9 million, including a 2:1 match from Walmart—thanks to the incredible generosity of Walmart.com and Walmart app customers. This marks the third consecutive year Walmart has selected Operation Homefront as a beneficiary of the Spark Good Veterans Day Round Up, underscoring their unwavering commitment to military and veteran families nationwide.

thumbnail.caption: Customers who shopped on Walmart.com and the Walmart app had the opportunity to round up their purchases at checkout and make additional donations to help advance Operation Homefront’s mission to build strong, stable, and secure military and veteran families.

headline: Indian yarn maker Trident posts quarterly profit slump as exports soften
summary: Feb 9 (Reuters) - Indian towel and bedsheet maker Trident reported a 44% fall in profit on Monday, as a U.S. tariff-triggered slowdown in exports squeezed sales during the third quarter.

content.title: Indian yarn maker Trident posts quarterly profit slump as exports soften
content.summary: Feb 9 (Reuters) - Indian towel and bedsheet maker Trident reported a 44% fall in profit on Monday, as a U.S. tariff-triggered slowdown in exports squeezed sales during the third quarter.

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Novo Nordisk, Hims & Hers, Apollo
summary: ↗️ Novo Nordisk (NVO), (DK:NOVO.B): The Danish drugmaker's stock gained more than 8% after Hims & Hers (HIMS) said it will stop offering a copycat version of Novo Nordisk's weight-loss pill. Shares in Hims & Hers slumped in premarket trading.

content.title: Stocks to Watch Monday: Novo Nordisk, Hims & Hers, Apollo
content.summary: ↗️ Novo Nordisk (NVO), (DK:NOVO.B): The Danish drugmaker's stock gained more than 8% after Hims & Hers (HIMS) said it will stop offering a copycat version of Novo Nordisk's weight-loss pill. Shares in Hims & Hers slumped in premarket trading.

headline: Ed Bastian, CEO of Delta Air Lines, Named Co-Chair of Financial Literacy for All Initiative
summary: ATLANTA, February 09, 2026--Financial Literacy for All (FL4A), a national initiative dedicated to advancing financial education and economic opportunity for all, today announced that Ed Bastian, Chief Executive Officer of Delta Air Lines, will assume the role of Co-Chair, succeeding Doug McMillon, President and CEO of Walmart, who has served in the role since the initiative’s launch.

content.title: Ed Bastian, CEO of Delta Air Lines, Named Co-Chair of Financial Literacy for All Initiative
content.summary: ATLANTA, February 09, 2026--Financial Literacy for All (FL4A), a national initiative dedicated to advancing financial education and economic opportunity for all, today announced that Ed Bastian, Chief Executive Officer of Delta Air Lines, will assume the role of Co-Chair, succeeding Doug McMillon, President and CEO of Walmart, who has served in the role since the initiative’s launch.

headline: Kroger names former Walmart executive as its new CEO
summary: Kroger named former Walmart executive Greg Foran as its chief executive officer on Monday, 11 months after the abrupt resignation of its previous CEO.  Foran led Walmart's U.S. division for six years before departing in 2019.  While there, he introduced online ordering and pickup, and accelerated Walmart's digital capabilities.

content.title: Kroger names former Walmart executive as its new CEO
content.summary: Kroger named former Walmart executive Greg Foran as its chief executive officer on Monday, 11 months after the abrupt resignation of its previous CEO.  Foran led Walmart's U.S. division for six years before departing in 2019.  While there, he introduced online ordering and pickup, and accelerated Walmart's digital capabilities.
